title: WP SMS Marketing v2.1 - Premium WordPress Plugins
description:
WP SMS marketing is a fully integrated plugin to enhanced marketing purpose; WP SMS marketing application has rich features like Bulk SMS, Scheduler, Campaigns, Auto Responder. If you are running hotel, restaurant, hospital, you will deferentially need this plugin in your life, you can control your customer you are dealing with remotely. Contains external links.

To install:
1. Upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
